column2: Fada N'gourma means "place where one pays the tax".

column1: The town was founded by Diaba Lompo as Bingo at the beginning of the 13th century. The French arrived at the town in January 1895 and the local Gurma ruler accepted French protection.
Fada N'gourma has a hot semi-arid climate (Köppen climate classification BSh).
